column5: 1. When operating new equipment for the first time I prefer to_Have a go and learn by "trial and error"
column6: 2. When seeking travel directions I_Look at a map
column7: 3. When cooking a new dish I_Call a friend for explaination
column8: 4. To teach someone something I_Write Instructions
column9: 5. I tend to say _I hear what you are saying
column11: 7. I tend to say _Listen to me explain
column12: 8. Complaining about faulty goods I tend to_Go back to the store, or send the faulty item to the head office
column13: 9. I prefer these leisure activities_Museums or galleries
column14: 10. When shopping generally I tend to_Discuss with shop staff
column15: 11. Choosing a holiday I_Read the brochures
column16: 12. Choosing a new car I_Discuss with friends
column17: 13. Learning a new skill_I like to give it a try and work it out as I go along by doing it
column18: 14. Choosing from a restaurant menu_I talk through the options in my head
column19: 15. When listening to a band_I listen to the lyrics and the beats
column20: 16. When concentrating I_Move around a lot, fiddle with pens and pencils and touch unrelated things
column21: 17. I remember things best by_Doing and practicing the activity or imagining it being done
column22: 18. My first memory is of_Looking at something
column23: 19. When anxious I_Talk over in my head what worries me most
column24: 19. When anxious I_Visualize the worst case scenarios
column25: 20. I feel especially connected to others because of_how they make me
column26: 21. When I revise for an exam, I_I talk over my notes, to myself or to other people
column27: 22. When explaining something to someone, I tend to_Encourage them to try and talk them through the idea as they try
column28: 23. My main interests are_Physical/sports activities or fine wines, fine foods or dancing
column29: 24. Most of my free time is spent_Doing physical activity or making things
column30: 25. When I first contact a new person_I try to get together to share an activity
column31: 26. I first notice how people_Look and dress
column32: 27. If I am very angry_I stomp about, slam doors and throw things
column33: 28. I find it easiest to remember_Faces
column34: 29. I think I can tell someone is lying because_They avoid looking at you
column35: 30. When I'm meeting with an old friend_I give them a hug or a handshake
column36: Preferred learning mode_Asynchronous Online Learning (On your own time)
